thoughts.text: The read_file command failed because the scrape_website.py.out file was not created. I will use the execute_python_file command to execute the scrape_website.py file and create the output file.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the execute_python_file command to execute the scrape_website.py file will create the output file and allow me to use the read_file command to get the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail. This will help me ensure that I am adequately prepared for my adventure.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_python_file command to execute the scrape_website.py file and create the output file
- Use the read_file command to read the output of the scrape_website.py file and get the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail
- Use this information to prepare for my adventure
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am adequately prepared for the trip and not take unnecessary risks.
